actions.name: invoices
actions.action_worker:
import zugferd_utils

xml =  get_zugferd_xml(mem.r.id)

form = Q2Form("XML viewer")
form.add_control("xml", "XML", control="codexml", data=xml)
form.run()

actions.name: invoices
actions.action_worker:
rep = get_report("Invoice-1")
if rep:
    rep.params["id"] = mem.r.id
    ?rep.run()

actions.name: invoices
invoices

forms.name: invoices
forms.title: Invoices
forms.after_form_load:
def is_locked(mem=mem):
    return mem.r.invoice_number != ""

mem.heap.is_locked=is_locked

def check_lines_action(mem=mem):
    lines_form = mem.a.__getattr__(_("Lines"))["child_form_object"]
    mem.disabled_actions = []
    if mem.heap.is_locked():
        lines_form.disabled_actions = [_("New"), _("Copy"), _("Remove")]
        mem.disabled_actions.append(_("Set number"))
        mem.disabled_actions.append(_("Recalculation"))
        mem.disabled_actions.append(_("Remove"))
        lines_form.disabled_actions.append(_("Renumber"))
        lines_form.disabled_actions.append(_("Move up"))
        lines_form.disabled_actions.append(_("Move down"))
        # mem.disable_action(_("Set number"))
    else:
        lines_form.disabled_actions  = []
        # mem.enable_action(_("Set number"))
    

mem.heap.check_lines_action = check_lines_action

def recalc_vat_breakdown(mem=mem):
    sql = f"""
                    select vat_rate
                        , invoice_id
                        , sum(net_total) as tax_base_amount
                        , sum(vat_total) as tax_amount
                        
                    from invoice_lines 
                    where invoice_id = {mem.r.id}
                    group by vat_rate
                """
    cu = q2cursor(sql)
    cu2 = q2cursor(f"""select 
                                    max(invoice_id) as id
                                    , sum(tax_base_amount) as net_amount
                                    , sum(tax_base_amount+tax_amount) as gross_amount
                            from ({sql}) qq
                            """)
    transaction()
    
    update("invoices", cu2.get_record(0))
    delete("vat_breakdown", {"invoice_id": mem.r.id})
    for x in cu.records():
        insert("vat_breakdown", x)
    commit()
    mem.model.refresh_record(mem.current_row)
    mem.a.__getattr__(_("Tax breakdown"))["child_form_object"].refresh()

mem.heap.recalc_vat_breakdown = recalc_vat_breakdown

mem.c.invoice_number["disabled"] = "" if const.demo_mode else "*"
forms.before_form_show:
if mem.crud_mode == "NEW":
    mem.s.curr_id=const.base_curr_id
    mem.s.seller_id = const.base_part_id
    mem.s.invoice_date = today()

if mem.crud_mode != "EDIT":    
    mem.s.invoice_number = ""
    mem.s.zugferd_pdf_id = 0

# if const.demo_mode == "" and mem.s.invoice_number:
    # mem.w.invoice_date.set_enabled(False)

if mem.heap.is_locked() and mem.crud_mode == "EDIT":
    mem.set_readonly()
    mem.w._cancel_button.set_enabled(1)

forms.name: invoice_lines
forms.form_refresh:
mem.s.net_total = round_(num(mem.s.quantity) * num(mem.s.net_price) ,2)
mem.s.vat_total = round_(num(mem.s.net_total) * num(mem.s.vat_rate) / num(100) ,2)
mem.s.gross_total = num(mem.s.net_total) + num(mem.s.vat_total)

mem.disable_action(_("New"))

forms.name: invoices_af
forms.title: Invoices

forms.name: settings
forms.title: Settings

forms.name: invoices_date_filter
forms.before_form_show:
where_list = []
where_list.append(f"invoice_date >= '{const.date1}'")
where_list.append(f"invoice_date <= '{const.date2}'")

where_string = " and ".join(where_list)
q2_app.run_form("invoices", where=where_string)
return False

forms.name: settings_inv_num
forms.title: party_inv_num_settings
forms.form_refresh:
if num(form.s.inv_num_year)>2:
    form.w.inv_num_month.set_disabled()
    form.w.inv_num_day.set_disabled()
else:
    form.w.inv_num_month.set_enabled()
    form.w.inv_num_day.set_enabled(form.s.inv_num_month)
if num(form.s.inv_num_len) < 3:
    form.s.inv_num_len = 3
if num(form.s.inv_num_len) >=7 :
    form.s.inv_num_len = 6
    

import get_invnum
form.s.sample_number = format_invnum("RE", 
                    123, 
                    year=form.s.inv_num_year, 
                    month=form.s.inv_num_month,
                    day=form.s.inv_num_day,
                    sep=form.s.inv_num_sep,
                    len_=form.s.inv_num_len
                    )

lines.name: invoice_lines
lines.code_valid:
if mem.heap.last_prod_id != mem.s.prod_id:
    rec = get("products", ["prod_id=%s", mem.s.prod_id])
    mem.s.name = rec.get("name")
    mem.s.description = rec.get("description")
    mem.s.unit_id = rec.get("default_unit_id")
    mem.s.net_price = rec.get("default_net_price")
    mem.s.vat_rate = rec.get("default_vat_rate")

lines.label: Select Text Fragment
lines.name: invoices
lines.code_valid:
myform = get_form("text_fragments")

def select(mem=mem, myform=None):
    def worker():
        mem.s.initial_note = myform.r.content
        myform.close()
    return worker
myform.add_action("Select", select(myform=myform) ,tag="select")
myform.run()

myform = get_form("text_fragments")

def select(mem=mem, myform=None):
    def worker():
        mem.s.closing_note = myform.r.content
        myform.close()
    return worker
myform.add_action(_("Select"), select(myform=myform) ,tag="select")
myform.run()

from q2rad.q2appmanager import AppManager
for table in data:
    if self.db_data.table(table).row_count()<=0:
        dt = {table: data[table]}
        AppManager.import_json_data(dt)

modules.name: zugferd_utils
modules.script:
def get_zugferd_xml(id):
    from q2zugferd import q2zugferd_xml
    
    invoice_header = get("invoices", ["id=%s", id])
    seller = get("parties", ["part_id=%s", invoice_header["seller_id"]])
    seller["country_code"] = seller["country_id"]
    buyer = get("parties", ["part_id=%s", invoice_header["buyer_id"]])
    buyer["country_code"] = buyer["country_id"]
    currency = get("currencies", ["curr_id=%s", invoice_header["curr_id"]])
    seller_id = invoice_header['seller_id']
    seller_bank_account = get("bank_accounts", f"part_id={seller_id} order by default_account desc")
    invoice_lines = q2cursor(f"""    select invoice_lines.*
                                                , invoice_lines.net_total as net_line_total
                                                , unit_codes.code as unit_code
                                              from invoice_lines 
                                              left join unit_codes on unit_codes.unit_id = invoice_lines.unit_id
                                                where invoice_id={id} 
                                                order by line_number
                                           """).get_rows()
    vat_breakdown = q2cursor(f"select * from vat_breakdown where invoice_id={id} order by vat_rate").get_rows()
    
    zugferd_data = {
        "invoice_header": invoice_header,
        "seller": seller,
        "buyer":buyer,
        "currency":currency,
        "seller_bank_account": seller_bank_account,
        "invoice_lines": invoice_lines,
        "vat_breakdown":vat_breakdown
    }
    # q2mess(zugferd_data)
    zu = q2zugferd_xml(zugferd_data)
    return zu

modules.script:
myapp.binary_url = "https://datatodoc.de/q2-apps/q2re_sfx"
myapp.app_title = "q2-REchnungen"
myapp.app_description = """q2-REchnungen ist ein leistungsstarkes Tool zur einfachen 
und professionellen Erstellung von Rechnungen.
Die Anwendung unterstützt den gesamten Prozess – von der Vorbereitung 
der Daten bis zur Ausgabe in verschiedenen Formaten wie PDF, DOCX, XLSX und HTML.
Zusätzlich bietet q2-Rechnungen eine vollständige Unterstützung des elektronischen 
Rechnungsstandards ZUGFeRD, sodass Sie rechtssichere und strukturierte Rechnungen erstellen können."""
myapp.app_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreiPuchko/q2market/main/q2re"

modules.name: _get_num
modules.script:
def check_num(id):
    import get_invnum
    
    row = get("invoices", ["id=%s", (id,)])
    current_settings = {}
    is_this_year_settings = False
    
    is_invoice = q2cursor(f"""
                select id 
                from invoices 
                where seller_id = {row['seller_id']} 
                    and invoice_date>='{row['invoice_date'][:4]}-01-01'  
                    and invoice_number <> ''
                """).row_count() > 0
    if not is_invoice:
        this_year_settings_cursor = q2cursor(f"""
                    select * 
                    from party_inv_num_settings 
                    where part_id = {row['seller_id']}
                        and date>='{row['invoice_date'][:4]}-01-01'  
                        order by date
                        limit 1
                    """)
        is_this_year_settings = this_year_settings_cursor.row_count() > 0
        if not is_this_year_settings:
            fm = Q2Form("Invoice Number Settings")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("date", _("Start date of validity of the invoice number format"), 
                                    datatype="date", data=today()[:4], disabled="*")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("ns",control="form", widget=get_form("settings_inv_num"))
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.ok_button=1
            fm.cancel_button=1
            
            def before_form_show(fm=fm):
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_day.set_text(const.inv_num_day)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_month.set_text(const.inv_num_month)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_year.set_text(const.inv_num_year)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_seq.set_text(const.inv_num_seq)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_sep.set_text(const.inv_num_sep)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_len.set_text(const.inv_num_len)
                
            fm.before_form_show = before_form_show
            
            fm.run()
            if fm.ok_pressed:
                fm._model_record["part_id"] = row["seller_id"]
                if insert("party_inv_num_settings", fm._model_record):
                    current_settings = dict(fm._model_record)
        else:
            current_settings = this_year_settings_cursor.get_record(0)
    
    if not current_settings:
        current_settings = q2cursor(f"""
                    select * 
                    from party_inv_num_settings 
                    where part_id = {row['seller_id']}
                        and date <= '{row['invoice_date']}'  
                    order by date desc
                    limit 1
                    """).get_record(0)
    
    if current_settings:
        if int_(current_settings["inv_num_seq"]) <= 1:
            date_part = row["invoice_date"][:4] + "-01-01"
        elif int_(current_settings["inv_num_seq"]) == 2:
            date_part = row["invoice_date"][:7] + "-01"
        else:
            date_part = ""
        if date_part:
            date_part = f" and invoice_date >= {date_part}"
        last_number=int_(q2cursor(f"""
                    select invoice_number 
                    from invoices
                    where seller_id = {row['seller_id']}
                            and invoice_number <> ''
                            {date_part}
                    order by invoice_date desc, invoice_number desc
                    limit 1
                    """).get_record(0).get("invoice_number", "0"))
        if last_number == 0:
            fm = Q2Form(_("First invoice number in sequence"))
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("inumber", _("First invoice number in sequence"), datatype="int", data=1)
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.ok_button=1
            fm.cancel_button=1
            fm.run()
            if fm.ok_pressed:
                inumber = fm.s.inumber
            else:
                inumber = 1
        else:
            inumber = last_number+1
        ?get_invnum(number = inumber)
        
    else:
        q2mess(_("Invoice number settings not found!"))
        return ""


    
if __name__ == "__main__":
    check_num(4)

modules.name: get_invnum
modules.script:
def format_invnum(seria="RE", number=99,  sep="-", year=1, month=0, day=0,len_=5  ,date=today()):
    rez = seria
    if  not (num(year) == 3 or year is None or year == ""):
        if f"{year}" == "2":
            rez  += sep + "" + date[2:4]
        else:
            rez  += sep + "" + date[:4]

        if month:
            rez  += sep + "" + date[5:7]
            if day:
                rez  += sep + "" + date[8:10]
        
    rez  += sep +  f"{number}".rjust(int_(len_), "0")    
    return rez


def get_invnum(id):
    row = get("invoices", ["id=%s", (id,)])
    if row["invoice_number"]:
        return ""
    current_settings = {}
    is_this_year_settings = False
    
    is_invoice = q2cursor(f"""
                select id 
                from invoices
                where seller_id = {row['seller_id']}
                    and invoice_date>='{row['invoice_date'][:4]}-01-01'  
                    and prefix>='{row['prefix']}'
                    and invoice_number <> ''
                """).row_count() > 0
    if not is_invoice:
        this_year_settings_cursor = q2cursor(f"""
                    select * 
                    from party_inv_num_settings 
                    where part_id = {row['seller_id']}
                        and date>='{row['invoice_date'][:4]}-01-01'  
                        order by date
                        limit 1
                    """)
        is_this_year_settings = this_year_settings_cursor.row_count() > 0
        if not is_this_year_settings:
            fm = Q2Form("Invoice Number Settings")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("date", _("Start date of validity of the invoice number format"), 
                                    datatype="date", data=today()[:4], disabled="*")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("ns",control="form", widget=get_form("settings_inv_num"))
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.ok_button=1
            fm.cancel_button=1
            
            def before_form_show(fm=fm):
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_day.set_text(const.inv_num_day)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_month.set_text(const.inv_num_month)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_year.set_text(const.inv_num_year)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_seq.set_text(const.inv_num_seq)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_sep.set_text(const.inv_num_sep)
                fm.w.ns.inv_num_len.set_text(const.inv_num_len)
                
            fm.before_form_show = before_form_show
            
            fm.run()
            if fm.ok_pressed:
                fm._model_record["part_id"] = row["seller_id"]
                if insert("party_inv_num_settings", fm._model_record):
                    current_settings = dict(fm._model_record)
        else:
            current_settings = this_year_settings_cursor.get_record(0)
    
    if not current_settings:
        current_settings = q2cursor(f"""
                    select * 
                    from party_inv_num_settings 
                    where part_id = {row['seller_id']}
                        and date <= '{row['invoice_date']}'  
                    order by date desc
                    limit 1
                    """).get_record(0)
    
    if current_settings:
        seq = int_(current_settings["inv_num_seq"])
        sep = current_settings["inv_num_sep"]
        day = current_settings["inv_num_day"]
        month = current_settings["inv_num_month"]
        year = int_(current_settings["inv_num_year"])
        len_= int_(current_settings["inv_num_len"])

        if seq <= 2:
            date_part = row["invoice_date"][:4] + "-01-01"
        else:
            date_part = ""
            
        if date_part:
            date_part = f" and invoice_date >= {date_part}"
            
        last_number_dic = q2cursor(f"""
                    select invoice_number , invoice_date
                    from invoices
                    where seller_id = {row['seller_id']}
                            and invoice_number <> ''
                            and prefix>='{row['prefix']}'
                            {date_part}
                    order by invoice_date desc, invoice_number desc
                    limit 1
                    """).get_record(0)
        last_number = last_number_dic.get("invoice_number", 0)
        if last_number == 0:
            fm = Q2Form(_("First invoice number in sequence"))
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.add_control("/h")
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("inumber", _("First invoice number in sequence"), datatype="int", data=1)
            fm.add_control("/s")
            fm.add_control("/")
            fm.ok_button=1
            fm.cancel_button=1
            fm.run()
            if fm.ok_pressed:
                inumber = fm.s.inumber
            else:
                inumber = 1
        else:
            if last_number_dic["invoice_date"] > row["invoice_date"]:
                q2mess(_("There is already an invoice with a later date - ")
                    + dtoc(last_number_dic['invoice_date'])
                    + ", "
                    + last_number
                    )
                return ""
            last_number = num(last_number.split(sep)[-1])
            if seq == 2 and last_number_dic["invoice_date"][:7] != row["invoice_date"][:7]:
                last_number = 0
            else:
                pass
            
            inumber = last_number+1
        return format_invnum(number = inumber, seria=row.get("prefix"), sep=sep, year=year, month=month,day=day, len_=len_, date=row.get("invoice_date"))
    else:
        q2mess(_("Invoice number settings not found!"))
        return ""


if __name__ == "__main__":
    # ?format_invnum("RE", 161, year="4", month=None)
    ?get_invnum(8)
